contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of December, 2015, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by petitioner, is:
(1) Whether Fayette County’s reassessment of improved power plant real estate located within a Keystone Opportunity Zone and exempt from real estate taxation constituted a spot reassessment where the reassessment occurred in the year immediately following expiration of the Keystone Opportunity Zone tax exemption?
Justice EAKIN did not participate in the decision of this matter.
